content.text:
# 2025 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards

| network     = MultishowTV GloboGloboplay
| ratings     =
| previous    = 2024
| main        = Multishow Brazilian Music Awards
| next        =
}}
The 2025 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2025 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2025) will be held on 9 December 2025, in Rio de Janeiro. The ceremony will be broadcast on Multishow and TV Globo and streamed on Globoplay. Tadeu Schmidt and Kenya Sade will be host the show. The nominations were announced on November 2025.
Background
In September 2025, it was announced that the 32nd Multishow Awards would take place on 9 December 2025, hosted by Tadeu Schmidt and Kenya Sade. It was also revealed that Gilberto Gil would honored with a lifetime achievement award. With general direction of Marcelo Amiky, genre direction by Joana Thimoteo and production by Ana Schmidt and Nicolas Rebouças, the ceremony will be broadcast in full for the first time on Multishow, TV Globo, and streamed on Globoplay.
Nominees
The nominees were announced on 17 November 2025. Ana Castela, João Gomes, Marina Sena and Zé Felipe had the most nominations with six each, followed by Gaby Amarantos, Menos é Mais and Simone Mendes with five each.
Voted categories
The winners of the following categories will be chosen by fan votes.
